translations: 英寸；（距离或数量）少许；<非正式>身高，腰围
（数量）逐渐增加（或减少）；（使）缓慢移动

phrs.translation: adv. 缓慢地；一点一点地，逐渐地；好不容易地

sentences.sentence: There are 2.54 centimetres to an inch.
Nick's grown almost an inch in the last month.
sentences.translation: 尼克这一个月来长高了差不多一英寸。

sentences.sentence: Text and graphics are printed at 300 dots per inch.
sentences.translation: 文字和插图按每英寸300个点的密度打印。
